GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
siox: fix possible memory leak in siox_device_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit d9c31e728843259209fb530c59995e4fe262699f, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit bbecb07fa0af9a41507ce06d4631fdb3b5059417. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: siox: fix possible memory leak in siox_device_add()
